title: E-commerce Website Redesign
summary: Complete redesign of an outdoor equipment retailer's online store
description:
Led the complete redesign of Mountain Gear Co.'s e-commerce platform, focusing on mobile-first design and improved checkout flow.

Key achievements:
- 40% increase in mobile conversions
- Reduced cart abandonment by 25%
- Implemented new product filtering system
- Integrated with existing inventory management

Worked closely with the marketing team to ensure brand consistency across all touchpoints.
testimonial: The redesign exceeded our expectations. Sales are up significantly and customers love the new experience.
